mapper.insert: insert into `orderbillitem` (costPrice, number, amount, remark, product_id, bill_id) values (#{costPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{number,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{product.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{billId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.select: SELECT item.id,item.costPrice, item.number,item.amount, item.remark, item.product_id, item.bill_id, p.id p_id,p.name p_name,b.id b_id ,b.name b_name from `orderbillitem` item JOIN product p ON item.product_id=p.id JOIN brand b ON p.brand_id=b.id WHERE item.bill_id = #{id}
